## Microsoft

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)

# Load the data
msft_data <- read.csv("msft.csv")

# Preview the data
head(msft_data)
summary(msft_data)

```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false
2 * 2
```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
